31.eng-name: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Prophet (ﷺ) as saying:If anyone emancipates a share in his slave, he should completely emancipate him if he has money; but if he has none, then slave will be required to work (to pay for his freedom), but he must not be overburdened

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ ذَكَرَ السِّعَايَةَ فِي هَذَا الْحَدِيثِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Mentioned Working In Order To Pay Off The Remaining Portion, In This Hadith
